overview: In Part One, the Beast (John Leslie) found True Love (Tracy Adams) and lived happily ever after. That is, until Part Two. When a cad named Jarvis blackmails the queen into bed, the Beast 'virus' stirs inside the King once more. Between the erotic goings-on of the King's lovely daughters (Chaz Vincent & Victoria Paris), the randy servants and his own revenge. Paul Thomas paints another fairy tale definitely not for the kids.
tagline: True Love Conquers All. Except Lust.
title: Beauty and the Beast 2
